thread.section_title: Oponeo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oponeo | oponeo.ie
thread.title: Amber

author: Amber
title: Amber
text:
Bought these tyres last year as I read reviews so I said I will give a go.
My mileage is huge nd usually I changing my tyres very often,nd on Irish weather is very hard to find good tyres coz neither we have summer neither winter, Micheline crossclimate tyres were best tyres I ever had came across they keep car super stable on the rd , rd grip fantastic on rainy days I feels absolutely relaxed driving, I feel safe Driving my car never had skeet since I bought them, where I had experience with some tyres my back of the car use to skeet on rainy days , but never with Micheline crossclimate, they last me a year (30000 miles)with my mileage I was surprised coz none of other tyres lost me that long.
I bought them again a week ago as they are super good I'm 100% satisfied super happy customer, nd gonna stick to them ONLY
100% recommending
No regrets whatsoever
